column5: This charming rental is a duplex home located in the heart of New Braunfels. Side A is downstairs and will sleep up to 6 guests with 1 Queen, 1 futon and 1 Sleeper Sofa. This unit has no kitchen facility but does include a microwave, small refrigerator, towels, linens, TV and more! The duplex also boasts a large front deck for guests to relax on which is shared.
column8: Convenience in all directions! - Griffs Place A
